text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 43.89px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: Description --- No matter what happens, no matter the odds or opposition, the
Survivor always manages to pull through. Whether alone or with a group, the
Survivor’s utter refusal to accept defeat often makes the difference between success
and failure. Survivors are frustrated by others’ acceptance of “what fate has in
store” or willingness to withstand less than what they can achieve. Outcasts, street
folk and idealists may well be Survivor Archetypes.

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: System --- Regain one point of Willpower whenever you survive a threatening
situation through tenacity, or when another persists in spite of opposition due to
your counsel.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: Description --- The Conformist is a follower, taking another’s lead and finding
security in the decisions of others. She prefers not to take charge, instead seeking
to throw in with the rest of the group and lend her own unique aid. The Conformist
is drawn to the most dynamic personality or the individual she perceives to be the
“best.” Being a Conformist is not necessarily a bad thing — every group needs
followers to lend stability to their causes. Groupies, party voters and “the masses”
are Conformist Archetypes.

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 43.89px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 43.89px; fill: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke: rgb(136, 136, 136); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player rolls all Strength-related tests normally, but then adds an automatic success
for each point he has in Potence. Thus, the character succeeds at most Strength feats
without needing to make a roll at all. In melee and brawling combat, the automatic
successes are applied to the damage roll results.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: The player rolls Manipulation + Occult (difficulty 7). Success on the roll generates darkness
roughly 10 feet in diameter, though the amorphous cloud constantly shifts and
undulates, sometimes even extending shadowy tendrils. Each additional success doubles
the diameter of the cloud (though the vampire may voluntarily reduce the area she
wishes to cover). The cloud may be invoked at a distance of up to 50 yards, though
creating darkness outside the vampire’s line of sight adds two to the difficulty of the roll
and requires a blood point’s expenditure.

text.style: font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68);
text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.05pt;
text.tspan: This power requires no roll, but a blood point must be spent to activate it. Shadow Play
lasts for one scene and requires no active concentration. Kindred cloaking themselves in
shadow gain an extra die in their Stealth dice pools and add one to the difficulties of
ranged weapon attacks against them. Vampires who use the darkness to make
themselves more terrifying add one die to Intimidation dice pools. Opponents plagued by
flapping shadows and strangling darkness subtract one die from soak and Stamina dice
pools. Mortals, ghouls and other air-breathers reduced to zero Stamina in this manner
begin to asphyxiate; vampires lose all appropriate dice but are otherwise unaffected.
Only one target or subject may be affected by this power at any given time, though
some modicum of concealment is offered to a relatively motionless group.

text.style: text-anchor: start; font-family: Gochi Hand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(68, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(102, 68, 68); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: middle; font-family: Khand; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: start; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
text-anchor: end; font-family: Philosopher; font-size: 19.019px; fill: rgb(34, 34, 34); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(170, 34, 34); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;

rect.style: fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); stroke: rgb(17, 17, 17); stroke-width: 1pt; cursor: pointer;

text.style: font-family: Khand; text-anchor: middle; font-size: 24.871px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: pointer; stroke: rgb(51, 51, 51); stroke-width: 0.5pt;
